channel.title: apache on Thoughts, Views & More...
channel.description: Recent content in apache on Thoughts, Views & More...

item.title: Change Websites Default Folder to Another Folder in Apache
item.description: Apache is the most used server. It is used to serve more than half of all active websites. It will be very helpful to understand Apache. Understanding the configuration of virtual host of Apache is important as sometime it will be a tough job to do. I will show you how to set default folder of a website other than root directory of Apache.

item.title: Htaccess to block ip
item.description: Websites are naturally geeks guinea pig . You will get much more spam if you get a website to comment or something . They just don’t stop . Try and try . You will find it very much annoying . You can pause them . Not stop but it will give you peace i think . Now open any text editor and
